title: The Queen’s Disease with Taylor Okata
description:
CAN WE GET A GD MF CHEE HOO?! This week, the boys are dialing in stylist Taylor Okata to get to the bottom of what it’s like dressing other people for a living. Taylor is riding the Throwing Fits wave, talking his work with Evan Mock, what makes an ideal client, viral looks, his best Yohji stories, Hawaiian culture, authentic surf style, getting into fights as a black belt and much more on this episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™. Mahalo.
 
Throwing Fits x Seasons: Use promo code “throwingfits” at checkout or subscribe at http://szns.co/throwingfits
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
